summary: A firebrand heiress clashes with her tyrannical father, a cattle rancher who fancies himself a Napoleon, but their relationship turns ugly only when he finds himself a new woman.
cast: Barbara Stanwyck|Wendell Corey|Walter Huston|Judith Anderson|Gilbert Roland|Thomas Gomez|Beulah Bondi|Albert Dekker|John Bromfield|Wallace Ford|Blanche Yurka|Louis Jean Heydt|Frank Ferguson|Charles Evans|Movita|Craig Kelly|Myrna Dell|Ray Beltram|Eumenio Blanco|John Breen|Georgia Clancy|James Davies|Artie Del Rey|Joe Dominguez|Sam Finn|Elias Gamboa|Douglas Grange|Chick Hannan|Pepe Hern|Stuart Holmes|Arthur Hunnicutt|Richard Kipling|Nolan Leary|Baron James Lichter|David O. McCall|William Meader|Jane Novak|Rosemary Pettit|Paul Ravel|Lou Steele|Bert Stevens|Dorothy Vernon|Eddy Waller|Glen Walters
title: Las furias
